A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This looked like a Star Wars film\, and the special effects sounded like a Star Wars film. Those are probably the only good things that I have to say about the film. Way too many plot holes. Useless storyline that consumes about 30 minutes of the film. This thing really seems as if it were written and produced by people whom have nothing but contempt for the fans that built this franchise.
